dmca.title: Re [2]: DMCA Complaint from Eastern Technical boys-love.ws
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: BucksMatrix.com Support Team [mailto:support@bucksmatrix.com] 
Posted At: Wednesday, August 16, 2006 8:24 PM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: Re [2]: DMCA Complaint from Eastern Technical boys-love.ws
Subject: Re [2]: DMCA Complaint from Eastern Technical boys-love.ws


Dear Sirs,

please look at the attached file for a new info about the photos that
were stolen today, on the 16th of August, 2006. We think that a new
email you get will be from our lawyer, because we can't monitor
boys-love.ws for our copyrighted photos 24 hours a day. If you can't
stop this, we'll go to the court.
Thank you in advance.

Best wishes,
Anton Feofanov.
EASTERN TECHNICAL s.r.o.


> To Whom It May Concern:
> 
> 
> 
> This letter confirms that access to the materials referenced in your 
> below-pasted complaint has been disabled.
> 
> 
> 
> Legal Response Team
> 
> The Planet
> 
> 
> 
> 
> ---------
> 
> 
> From: BucksMatrix.com Support Team [mailto:support@bucksmatrix.com]
> 
> Posted At: Tuesday, August 15, 2006 3:31 PM
> 
> Posted To: Copyright
> 
> Conversation: DMCA Complaint from Eastern Technical boys-love.ws
> 
> Subject: RE: DMCA Complaint from Eastern Technical boys-love.ws
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Dear Sirs,
> 
> 
> 
> please be advised that it's the 3rd time we contact you about the 
> owner of boys-love.ws. We'll be obliged if you could stop his illegal 
> activities ASAP. The info you requested is ATTACHED to this email.
> 
> Please confirm. Thank you.
> 
> 
> 
> Best wishes,
> 
> Anton Feofanov.
> 
> EASTERN TECHNICAL s.r.o.
